mapper.select: WITH numbered_table AS ( SELECT num, writer, join_date, title, readcount, content, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS row_num FROM wdttnews ) SELECT num, writer, join_date, title, readcount, content FROM numbered_table WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: update wdttnews set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select filename from wdttnews where num=#{num}
